items.content_html: Svelte: A refreshing approach to building web applications. It's a lightweight, modern, and highly efficient front-end framework that compiles components into highly optimized JavaScript at build time. With Svelte, you can write expressive and reactive components with ease, resulting in faster-loading, performant web apps.

It's a lightweight, modern, and highly efficient front-end framework that compiles components into highly optimized JavaScript at build time. With Svelte, you can write expressive and reactive components with ease, resulting in faster-loading, performant web apps.
